column3: COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Module
column4: Template for daily Hospital COVID-19 Reporting

column3: The Module enables hospitals to report daily counts of patients with suspected and confirmed COVID-19 diagnoses and current use and availability of hospital beds and mechanical ventilators.
